issues_reports.text: I demanded to know where my replacement phone was and was told TracFone is waiting for a shipment.  I was irate and told the customer service person  I didn’t believe him.  His next reply really angered me.  He told me they are having trouble keeping up with orders because they

@Tracfone It is not helpful AT ALL. ALLLLLLL of the phones - four tracfones in all - broken. Cannot receive or make calls. The few that rang no one got through. FOUR phones, and when I text the situation to that ridiculous robot text line, I get "how to buy a tracfone" and crap like that.

Tracfone changed my plan when I did not change it. When I call customer service they take forever to not be able to tell me why. They are not helpful. What is going on?
#tracfone @tracfone
@FlyrUsr This was most likely done by a sales rep, but is not reversible. You can port out to Verizon resellers: Tracfone, Total Wireless, Red Pocket. Same network but cheaper.
@priestknight121 @Tracfone How long does this SIM card Verizon switch take? You have shut down my phone.

@Tracfone i have been a loyal tracfone customer for many years.
i have decided that i am returning the phone for a refund. brand new 2022 model phone sold to me a lemon i don't appreciate this. i am switching to at&t they have better plans and coverage for my area anyway.  goodbye forever.
@Tracfone It’s most frustrating to try to converse with TracFone customer service reps because they have very poor English and I couldn’t understand anything they were saying.  Avoid TracFone!

A few arrogant companies with terrible customer service that is provided by third world dictatorships whose managements treat them as brainless slaves:
@Tracfone @Walmart @GreyhoundBus
need a bad ***** with a tracfone

@tfwirelessInc @Verizon @Walmart Buyer beware! Do not do business with tracfone. They'll take your money and when you return the phone that doesn't work they will not give you your money back for the minutes that you had to purchase to buy the phone beware buyer beware
it was a dumb side mail for social media so i never set up the backup email and the phone number was for a goddam tracfone my sister lent me so i guess i am just **** Out Of Luck lmao
@stetsondoggett If you thought this was bad, Total by Verizon (& other TracFone brands) doesn't work with the Pixel 7 entirely.

@KrisK1962 @dirtriverdesign @Tracfone Kinda bad. I can't use my pixel 7 pro with straight talk Verizon sim card but it does work with straight talk tmobile and att sim cards until they stop working with them since Verizon bought TracFone which also means Verizon bought straight talk. I actually switched to ST tmobile
@Tracfone is the WORST company I’ve EVER had the displeasure of dealing with. I’m trying to give an 80 year old man a way to reach his family in case of emergency. Why is this such a problem!?

#70%Terrible #SeventyPercentTerrible

TRACFONE problems. I tried to send text messages from my TRACFONE on 10/23/22, got a message "Can't send. Contact your carrier. (Error code 32773)". Tried to login to their website all I got was a message "...the Tracfone website is currently under maintenance.."

@Tracfone customer service is disgusting.  I returned my TracFone because it stopped working and was still under warranty but never got my replacement as promised.  I call customer service about 9 times and got nowhere.  No one knows when I’ll get a replacement.

.@tracfone @SIMPLEMobile - you guys have to find a better method to help a customer do a SIM swap especially if the customer activated the service with us. No dealer support means dealers won't be activating - if we can't help the customer, we just won't activate your service.

@KrisK1962 @dirtriverdesign @Tracfone Sim cards so I can at least get enough to text out in case of emergency.  Visible by Verizon works with pixel 7 pro. I actually signed up with them for a month (using the esim) so there's definitely an issue with straight talk Verizon sims and pixel 7 and pro.

@NoordhoekJustin Tracfone is terrible.  My phone stopped working while still under warranty.  Sent it back, and 3 weeks later, no new phone.  Cannot understand any of their customer service reps…bad broken English.  So disgusting

company_posts.name: Tracfone Wireless
company_posts.text: We want to help you sort this issue with your account, so you can regain access to it and manage your lines online. On the other hand, aside from logging in to your account online, you can also check your service end date by texting "DUE DATE" to 611611.

company_posts.name: Tracfone Wireless
company_posts.text: Hello there, and thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are genuinely sorry to hear you're still experiencing issues logging in and accessing the account information for your family's phones. We know how much of an inconvenience it is when you can't manage your service.

company_posts.name: Tracfone Wireless
company_posts.text: Hi, David. We are sorry for the inconvenient you had by trying to log in to your account. Send us a private message to continue assisting you!
